description:
Available in: English, Content localized

What's new: Fixed problems with changed webservice

Shows everything you need to know about your neighborhood. Explore interesting locations
and places around your current position or any other place on earth.

You can retrieve your current position using the build-in GPS device, specify some coordinates or search for a city, town or village. A list will show you many interesting locations and places around you. You can transfer the list of places into the free MapTool to view them on a map and navigate there. You can also get a detailed description of the location or place provided by the free wikipedia project. A link to Google Maps allows you to get a route calculated right from your place.
A filters for location type and a search feature complete the list.
To send locations to your facebook status you will need the official facebook app installed.
